=== DONZVO ===

Chinangwa chechikwata ndechekuturikira Ubuntu kubva muChirungu kuenda kuShona.Basa iri rinosanganisa kuturikira maPurogiramu nemapeji ebatsiro(Documentation and help pages) tichishandisa gwara rakatarwa <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Translations/TemplatesPriority|papeji]]</nowiki>i.e kutanga nemaProgramu anonyanyoshandiswa.

=== UNGAPINDESEI MUCHIKWATA ===

Enda <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/+faqs|papeji iyi]]</nowiki> kuti uvane zvizere.Enda <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-l10n-shn|papeji yeChikwata]]</nowiki>

=== GWARA ===
Mukuturikira maPurogiramu kana maPeji ebatsiro zvinokurudzirwa kushandisa Shona yanhasi (modern Shona) uye Union Shona. Semuenzaniso kunyangwe zvazvo inzwi rekuti Write (in the context of say a command button to excute the write to cd command) richigona kuturikirwa muShona sekuti "Nyora"; inzwi rakakodzera muShona ndi"Bhena" sezvo riiro rinonyanyo shandiswa nevanhu vanoShanda nemaKomputa zuva nezuva. Uyevo Union Shona kana kutiStandard Shona ndoShona isingakanganiswi <nowiki>[[http://newzim.proboards86.com/index.cgi?board=general&action=display&thread=153222&page=3|neChikandamazeko.]]</nowiki>

=== MANZWI EKUPEDZISIRA ===

Munokurudzirwa kuti muvedzere pane zvinhu zviri papeji rino.
